About WISE English Academy

We are dedicated to providing world-class Islamic education that combines traditional scholarship with modern learning methods.

Our Mission

To make authentic Islamic knowledge accessible to Muslims worldwide through innovative, high-quality educational programs that preserve the integrity of traditional Islamic scholarship while embracing modern teaching methodologies.

Our Values

These core values guide everything we do at WISE English Academy

Academic Excellence

We maintain the highest standards of Islamic scholarship and academic rigor in all our courses.

Spiritual Growth

Our platform fosters not just knowledge but spiritual development and connection with Allah.

Global Access

We make quality Islamic education accessible to Muslims worldwide, regardless of location or background.

Community Building

We foster a supportive learning community where students can grow together in their Islamic journey.

Comprehensive Curriculum

Our courses cover all major areas of Islamic knowledge from jurisprudence to Quranic studies.

Innovation

We combine traditional Islamic teaching methods with modern technology for effective learning.

Our Story

WISE English Academy was founded in 2020 with a vision to bridge the gap between traditional Islamic education and modern learning needs. Our founders, experienced Islamic scholars and educators, recognized the need for accessible, high-quality Islamic education in English.

Starting with a small team of dedicated instructors, we have grown into a global platform serving thousands of students worldwide. Our commitment to academic excellence and spiritual development has made us a trusted name in Islamic education.

Today, we continue to expand our curriculum, enhance our teaching methods, and reach more students while maintaining our core values of authenticity, accessibility, and excellence.

Key Milestones

2020 - Foundation

WISE English Academy was established

2021 - First Courses

Launched our first Islamic jurisprudence courses

2022 - Global Expansion

Reached students in 25+ countries

2023 - Platform Upgrade

Launched new learning management system

2024 - 10,000+ Students

Achieved milestone of 10,000+ enrolled students
